XData.name: Cube
XData.Data:
<cube xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee" name="DailyCube" displayName="パフォーマンス（日単位）統計" disabled="false" abstract="false" sourceClass="SYS.History.Daily" countMeasureName="%COUNT" bucketSize="8" bitmapChunkInMemory="false" precompute="0"> <dimension name="DateTime" displayName="時間別" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All DateTime" allDisplayName="DateTime" sourceProperty="DateTime" type="time" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="Day" displayName="日単位" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="Hourly" displayName="時単位" disabled="false" timeFunction="HourNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","PhysReads","Max")" name="PhysReadsMax" displayName="物理読込（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","PhysWrites","Max")" name="PhysWritesMax" displayName="物理書込（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","GloRef","Max")" name="GloRefMax" displayName="グローバル参照（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","PhysReads","Avg")" name="PhysReadsAvg" displayName="物理読込（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","PhysWrites","Avg")" name="PhysWritesAvg" displayName="物理書込（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","GloRef","Avg")" name="GloRefAvg" displayName="グローバル参照（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","RtnLoad","Max")" name="RtnLoadMax" displayName="ルーチン読込保存（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","RtnLoad","Avg")" name="RtnLoadAvg" displayName="ルーチン読込保存（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","RtnLoad","Max")" name="WIJWritesMax" displayName="WIJ書込ブロック（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","WIJWrites","Avg")" name="WIJWritesAvg" displayName="WIJ書込ブロック（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","RtnLoadRem","Max")" name="RtnLoadRemMax" displayName="ルーチン読込保存リモート（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","RtnLoadRem","Avg")" name="RtnLoadRemAvg" displayName="ルーチン読込保存リモート（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","ECPConn","Max")" name="ECPConnMax" displayName="ECPクライアント接続数（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","ECPConn","Avg")" name="ECPConnAvg" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","ECPConn","Max")" name="ECPBlockAddMax" displayName="ECPキャッシュブロック追加（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","ECPBlockAdd","Avg")" name="ECPBlockAddAvg" displayName="ECPキャッシュブロック追加（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","ECPBlockAdd","Max")" name="ObjLoadMax" displayName="オブジェクトロード（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","ObjLoad","Avg")" name="ObjLoadAvg" displayName="オブジェクトロード（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","ECPBlockPurgeBuff","Max")" name="ECPBlockPurgeBuffMax" displayName="ECPキャッシュブロック削除（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.ECPBlockPurgeBuff" sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","ECPBlockPurgeBuff","Avg")" name="ECPBlockPurgeBuffAvg" displayName="ECPキャッシュブロック削除（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.ECPBlockPurgeSvr" sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","ECPBlockPurgeSvr","Max")" name="ECPBlockPurgeSvrMax" displayName="ECPキャッシュブロック削除（byDBSrv）最大" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.ECPBlockPurgeSvr" sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Perf","ECPBlockPurgeSvr","Avg")" name="ECPBlockPurgeSvrAvg" displayName="ECPキャッシュブロック削除（byDBSrv）平均" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure>
<measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Sys","LicUsedLocal","Max")" name="LicUsedLocalMax" displayName="ローカルライセンス使用量（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Sys","LicUsedLocal","Avg")" name="LicUsedLocalAvg" displayName="ローカルライセンス使用量（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Sys","CSPSession","Max")" name="CSPSessionMax" displayName="CSPセッション最大" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Sys","CSPSession","Avg")" name="CSPSessionAvg" displayName="CSPセッション数（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Sys","CPUIOwait","Max")" name="CPUIOwaitMax" displayName="CPUI/O待ち（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Sys","CPUIOwait","Avg")" name="CPUIOwaitAvg" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Sys","CPUIdle","Max")" name="CPUIdleMax" displayName="CPUIdle最大" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Daily","Sys","CPUIdle","Avg")" name="CPUIdleAvg" displayName="CPUIdle（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure>
<calculatedMember name="CashEfficiencyAvg" displayName="キャッシュ効率（平均）" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="[MEASURES].[GloRefAvg]/([MEASURES].[PhysReadsAvg] + [MEASURES].[PhysWritesAvg])" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="CashEfficiencyMax" displayName="キャッシュ効率（最大）" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="[MEASURES].[GloRefMax]/([MEASURES].[PhysReadsMax] + [MEASURES].[PhysWritesMax])" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <listing name="DB_Info_Max" disabled="false" listingType="table" sql="select DateTime,Daily_DB->element_key,Daily_DB->DB_FileSize,Daily_DB->DB_FreeSpace from $$$SOURCE WHERE $$$RESTRICT"></listing> </cube>

XData.name: Cube
XData.Data: <cube xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee" name="HourlyCube" displayName="パフォーマンス（時単位）統計" disabled="false" abstract="false" sourceClass="SYS.History.Hourly" countMeasureName="%COUNT" bucketSize="8" bitmapChunkInMemory="false" precompute="0"> <dimension name="DateTime" displayName="時間別" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All DateTime" allDisplayName="DateTime" sourceProperty="DateTime" type="time" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="Day" displayName="日単位" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="Hourly" displayName="時単位" disabled="false" timeFunction="HourNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","PhysReads","Max")" name="PhysReadsMax" displayName="物理読込（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","PhysWrites","Max")" name="PhysWritesMax" displayName="物理書込（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","GloRef","Max")" name="GloRefMax" displayName="グローバル参照（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","PhysReads","Avg")" name="PhysReadsAvg" displayName="物理読込（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","PhysWrites","Avg")" name="PhysWritesAvg" displayName="物理書込（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","GloRef","Avg")" name="GloRefAvg" displayName="グローバル参照（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","RtnLoad","Max")" name="RtnLoadMax" displayName="ルーチン読込保存（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","RtnLoad","Avg")" name="RtnLoadAvg" displayName="ルーチン読込保存（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","RtnLoad","Max")" name="WIJWritesMax" displayName="WIJ書込ブロック（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","WIJWrites","Avg")" name="WIJWritesAvg" displayName="WIJ書込ブロック（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","RtnLoadRem","Max")" name="RtnLoadRemMax" displayName="ルーチン読込保存リモート（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","RtnLoadRem","Avg")" name="RtnLoadRemAvg" displayName="ルーチン読込保存リモート（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","ECPConn","Max")" name="ECPConnMax" displayName="ECPクライアント接続数（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","ECPConn","Avg")" name="ECPConnAvg" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","ECPConn","Max")" name="ECPBlockAddMax" displayName="ECPキャッシュブロック追加（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","ECPBlockAdd","Avg")" name="ECPBlockAddAvg" displayName="ECPキャッシュブロック追加（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","ECPBlockAdd","Max")" name="ObjLoadMax" displayName="オブジェクトロード（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","ObjLoad","Avg")" name="ObjLoadAvg" displayName="オブジェクトロード（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","ECPBlockPurgeBuff","Max")" name="ECPBlockPurgeBuffMax" displayName="ECPキャッシュブロック削除（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.ECPBlockPurgeBuff" sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","ECPBlockPurgeBuff","Avg")" name="ECPBlockPurgeBuffAvg" displayName="ECPキャッシュブロック削除（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.ECPBlockPurgeSvr" sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","ECPBlockPurgeSvr","Max")" name="ECPBlockPurgeSvrMax" displayName="ECPキャッシュブロック削除（byDBSrv）最大" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.ECPBlockPurgeSvr" sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","ECPBlockPurgeSvr","Avg")" name="ECPBlockPurgeSvrAvg" displayName="ECPキャッシュブロック削除（byDBSrv）平均" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Sys","LicUsedLocal","Max")" name="LicUsedLocalMax" displayName="ローカルライセンス使用量（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Sys","LicUsedLocal","Avg")" name="LicUsedLocalAvg" displayName="ローカルライセンス使用量（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Sys","CSPSession","Max")" name="CSPSessionMax" displayName="CSPセッション最大" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Sys","CSPSession","Avg")" name="CSPSessionAvg" displayName="CSPセッション数（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Sys","CPUIOwait","Max")" name="CPUIOwaitMax" displayName="CPUI/O待ち（最大）" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Sys","CPUIOwait","Avg")" name="CPUIOwaitAvg" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Sys","CPUIdle","Max")" name="CPUIdleMax" displayName="CPUIdle最大" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Sys","CPUIdle","Avg")" name="CPUIdleAvg" displayName="CPUIdle（平均）" disabled="false" aggregate="AVG" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <calculatedMember name="CashEfficiencyAvg" displayName="キャッシュ効率（平均）" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="[MEASURES].[GloRefAvg]/([MEASURES].[PhysReadsAvg] + [MEASURES].[PhysWritesAvg])" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="CashEfficiencyMax" displayName="キャッシュ効率（最大）" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="[MEASURES].[GloRefMax]/([MEASURES].[PhysReadsMax] + [MEASURES].[PhysWritesMax])" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <listing name="DB_Info_Max" disabled="false" listingType="table" sql="select DateTime,Hourly_DB->element_key,Max(Hourly_DB->DB_FileSize) As MaxFileSize,Min(Hourly_DB->DB_FreeSpace) As MinFreeSpace from $$$SOURCE WHERE $$$RESTRICT group by Hourly_DB->element_key"></listing> </cube>

XData.name: Cube
XData.Data: <cube xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee" name="HistoryPerfData" displayName="パフォーマンスデータ（間隔）" disabled="false" abstract="false" sourceClass="SYS.History.PerfData" countMeasureName="%COUNT" bucketSize="8" bitmapChunkInMemory="false" precompute="0"> <dimension name="ZTIMERange" displayName="時間範囲" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All ZTIME1" allDisplayName="ZTIME1" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="ZTIME" name="RANGE1" displayName="深夜/早朝/午前/日中/夕方" description="22-3/3-8/8-12/12-17/17-22" disabled="false" list="false" rangeExpression="[0,10800):深夜（0時～3時）;[79200,86400):深夜（22時～0時）;[10800,28800):早朝;[28800,43200):午前;[43200,61200):日中;[61200,79200):夕方;" useDisplayValue="false" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level sourceExpression="$PIECE($ZTIME($SELECT(%source.ZTIME=86400:0,1:%source.ZTIME)),":",1)" name="Hourly" displayName="時単位" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level sourceExpression="$PIECE($ZTIME($SELECT(%source.ZTIME=86400:0,1:%source.ZTIME)),":",2)" name="Minites" displayName="分単位" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="DateTime" displayName="時間別" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All DateTime" allDisplayName="DateTime" sourceProperty="DateTime" type="time" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="Day" displayName="日単位" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="Hourly" displayName="時単位" disabled="false" timeFunction="HourNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="Minite" displayName="分単位" disabled="false" timeFunction="MinuteNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.RtnLoad" name="RtnLoad" displayName="ルーチン読込と保存" disabled="false" aggregate="MAX" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.JrnBlock" name="JrnBlock" displayName="ジャーナルブロック（書込）" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.WIJWrites" name="WIJWrites" displayName="WIJ書込ブロック" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.ObjLoad" name="ObjLoad" displayName="オブジェクトロード数" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.ECPConn" name="ECPConn" displayName="ECPクライアント接続数" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.ECPBlockAdd" name="ECPBlockAdd" displayName="ECPAppキャッシュブロック追加" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.ECPBlockPurgeBuff" name="ECPBlockPurgeBuff" displayName="ECPAppキャッシュブロック削除" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.ECPBlockPurgeSvr" name="ECPBlockPurgeSvr" displayName="ECPAppキャッシュブロック削除（byDBSrv）" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.RtnLoadRem" name="RtnLoadRem" displayName="ルーチン読込保存（リモート）" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.PhysReads" name="PhysReads" displayName="物理読込" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.PhysWrites" name="PhysWrites" displayName="物理書込" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="Perf.GloRef" name="GloRef" displayName="グローバル参照（全体）" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <calculatedMember name="CachEfficiency" displayName="キャッシュ効率" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="[MEASURES].[GloRef]/([MEASURES].[PhysReads] + [MEASURES].[PhysWrites]) " hidden="false"></calculatedMember> </cube>

Method.name: GetElementKey
Method.Description:
ディメンジョン用:Hourly/Daily内Arrayの参照先オブジェクトのelementKeyを取得する
指定例：　##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetElemenetKey(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","PhysReads","Max")

Method.name: GetValue
Method.Description:
メジャー用:Hourly/Daily内Arrayの参照先オブジェクトの値を取得する
指定例：　##class(HistoryCube.Utils).GetValue(%source.%ID,"SYS.History.Hourly","Perf","PhysReads","Max")
